name: Recycl-O-Vert
description:
Meet Garba, the introverted lil' trash can. He loves collecting scraps, and mostly comfortable whenever he's nearby the recycling depot. 

Collect scrap to reach the quota and earn cash to upgrade some stats, but be aware, you only have "limited space" to carry these scraps. :D

This game was made within 72 hours in the BenBonk Game Jam 2020.(also resubmitted)

Controls:

WASD = Move around

Click = Pick hovered scraps > Moving near picked scraps = Collect

E = Recycle scraps

Space = Continue

Credits for some assets used:

[Main Menu Music]: (DRAMA - Track 02 (New song)) Creator: https://opengameart.org/content/cc0-scraps

[In-game Music]: (Casual 8-bit 2.wav) Creator: https://opengameart.org/content/casual-classic-loop-8-bit-2

[Font]: https://www.dafont.com/lycheesoda.font?l[]=10 Creator: https://www.dafont.com/jeti.d1589?l[]=10

Some gibberish:

Quite satisfied to submit a pretty decent game of mine. It could use a lot more polish but it somehow met some of my expectations. 

Any comments or feedback are greatly appreciated! :D
